# gibasa

>  Gibasa is a cleaner 'Rcpp' interface to 'MeCab'.

## Installation

```r
remotes::install_github("paithiov909/gibasa")
```

## Usage

```{r}
res <- gibasa::tokenize(
  c("頭が赤い魚を食べる猫",
    "望遠鏡で泳ぐ彼女を見た")
)

head(res)
head(gibasa::prettify(res))

gibasa::pack(res)
```
